display_long_description:
# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 [media]

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
[media]
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
[media]
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
[media]

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
[media]
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9


[media]
Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.

# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825305_713821748209256_1811666983523177845_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=K0_AR2PUhoAQ7kNvwHgrLmO&_nc_oc=AdkDCcwCepyaCqwLXICcf9UQD_cRrV9Xdx8fKq-jn-VQQ0up1CrL7s6Izh43EAtN79Y&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dK2uPJ4f85ToCut0gVXUiQ&oh=00_AftRyeId4OlnQbDiKWjm11jL1znLdecenHKqgtHu4Qf1gw&oe=6994511F)

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491819281_1416266746061693_1950535190430581396_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=j0l7IWRi_kcQ7kNvwEYaLc_&_nc_oc=AdnwJ3oIqOkflarBtnAvCVhJMwok0krnyuRsivdyKzG28gMlFYl8L_14k1mY_ePw8pM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Aft_e9PZDtb2x5TRJUmQzMLrs8iKOLJxzpyqJQfDsFOTEQ&oe=69944754)
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822558_1485561759489852_7463739102511266467_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=36zjJEIwpGYQ7kNvwF5_7wK&_nc_oc=AdkF6XOLoBSl53kuYqamwO-gQsiX80xki5VG028qQjA4lNRzKsnlgpXXsP7FA329W-4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dK2uPJ4f85ToCut0gVXUiQ&oh=00_AftZiuMbrOnIOkjipy-XFoAm8rIFhzVSrjtY8w-Rr_ca8g&oe=69946841)
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499295509_1469651344483231_5722649313226420511_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hpw4aVsMEJ0Q7kNvwGBlLgN&_nc_oc=AdnnmNx1FqyFzDJLcEEAuRlV4yjjThockf769fAFoJcgKaMeGbOHS0X423R-2Gr16dk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfvSiB6BvD9YhMWAHTABnaGyRbt9j22QOmi3pkt_GEvC5Q&oe=69944F9C)

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499294745_705784255648705_5777747854196816471_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=noDiWU9HHo8Q7kNvwEWWfW8&_nc_oc=Adn0PHqsxcX0165hwFpVWujMCL99QE7HqTklsJD09mW2BfNjjPFfDsBKXJYYpHHkxLI&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfuiwrJ66d7rS_H5U9L0jJuABkph97yqa71zrK7F9n4nJg&oe=69945931)
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9


![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491819341_1367013977921682_3777894233403332618_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CEaYKDzHhy4Q7kNvwF2mvcC&_nc_oc=AdmHtUDPdeIPh4OWdthTJBTlwoyytviD0pcvfyQCq2l-VwgXFx0zI0_dodjpICihHPs&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfvebFwpva6v9CbAtjjTMw9FJNhOSpv1m1uv3KmbzjyNRw&oe=699435DD)
Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.
